snippet: Decades ago, a market analysis drawn from the 1940 census explored the demographics of 116 New York City neighborhoods. A new analysis compares those areas then to what they are like today.
abstract: New York Times analysis compares current demographic statistics and photographs of five sample New York City neighborhoods with the findings of a 1940 census-based market analysis.
lead_paragraph: Decades ago, a market analysis drawn from the 1940 census explored the demographics of 116 New York City neighborhoods. A new analysis compares those areas then to what they are like today.

headline.seo: How New York City Has Changed Since the 1940 Census
headline.main: From Morrisania to Williamsburg, How the City Has Changed in 70 Years
headline.print_headline: From Morrisania to Williamsburg, How City Has Changed in 70 Years
